sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import pic from "../blankPicture.png"; // Fallback placeholder image const MembershipInformationModal = ({ member, onClose }) => { if (!member) return null; const memberSinceDate = new Date(member.registrationDate); const options = { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }; const formattedDate = memberSinceDate.toLocaleDateString('en-US', options); const dateOfBirth = new Date(member.dateOfBirth); const options2 = { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }; const formDate = dateOfBirth.toLocaleDateString('en-US', options2); const idPictureUrl = member.idPicture ? `http://localhost:3001/uploads/${member.idPicture}` : pic; return (
{member.memberType}

{member.fullNameLastName + ', ' + member.fullNameFirstName + ', ' + member.fullNameMiddleName}

Member Information

Membership ID: {member.memberCode}

Member since: {formattedDate}

Age: {member.age}

Sex: {member.sex}

Contact No: {member.contactNumber}

TIN: {member.tinNumber}

Address: {member.houseNoStreet + ', ' + member.barangay + ', ' + member.city}

Date of birth: {formDate}

Place of birth: {member.birthplaceProvince}

Civil status: {member.civilStatus}

Highest Education: {member.highestEducationalAttainment}

Occupation Source Of Income: {member.highestEducationalAttainment}

Financial Information

Shared Capital:

{member.shareCapital}

Savings:

{member.savings}

Loan Limit:

{member.loanLimit}

Dividend:

{member.dividend}

Account Information

Email:

{member.email}

Password:

{member.password}

Account status:

{member.accountStatus}

); }; export default MembershipInformationModal;
